author: Ryan Daws
description:
Ever wondered what happens when a company trying to build a ‘brain for the world’ needs to grow up, fast, without selling its soul? Well, OpenAI has just given us a peek as it pledges to keep its nonprofit core amid broader restructuring. OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has laid out their roadmap, and the headline […]

The post Sam Altman: OpenAI to keep nonprofit soul in restructuring appeared first on AI News.
title: Sam Altman: OpenAI to keep nonprofit soul in restructuring
